Company: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University (Virginia Tech)
Description of incident: The computer server of Virginia Tech's Department of Human Resources was accessed on August 28.  The information of people who applied online to Virginia Tech between 2003 and 2013 may have been accessed.  No Social Security numbers or financial information was exposed. A total of 16,642 job applicants had their driver's license numbers exposed.  The remaining job applicants had not submitted this information.
